Class Callables.CheckedCallable<T,EX extends Exception>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.base.Callables.CheckedCallable<T,EX>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - The type returned by Callable.
    EX - - The type of exception thrown by call.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<T>, Callables.RetryCallable<T,EX>

    public abstract static class Callables.CheckedCallable<T,EX extends Exception>
extends Object
implements Callables.RetryCallable<T,EX>
    A callable that will be retried.
